title: These 30 Items From Nordstrom, J.Crew, and Gap's Presidents' Day Sales Will Sell Out ASAP
description: I'm opening my wallet as I type this.
excerpt: A fashion editor shares her favorite sale finds from Nordstrom, J.Crew, and Gap.
text: For many people, long weekends mean an extra day off to spend with family and friends, but for me, they only mean one thing: holiday sale shopping. Okay not really, but the fashion editor in me does look forward to browsing online for amazing deals. I know the best items go quickly, so I got a head start on planning for this season's Presidents' Day sales. Spoiler alert: They're really good. Specifically, those at Nordstrom, Gap, and J.Crew—with discounts on must-have items like coats, shoes, knits, blouses, denim, and more, it's almost impossible not to grab something. I have no doubt these great finds will go quickly, so don't waste another second. Peruse my edit of favorites below.NordstromScrolling through Nordstrom's Winter Sale is like being a kid in a candy shop. You can score up to 60% off on clothes, beauty, and accessories. Reformation Martha Front Button Asymmetric Top Mocha mousse is the moment. Lioness Cobain Stripe Cotton Blend Pants I'd wear these on WFH days. Veronica Beard Penny Loafer These loafers are so quiet-luxury coded. Stuart Weitzman Flareblock 60 Zip Bootie You can't go wrong with a black bootie. Reformation Medium Rosetta Leather Shoulder Bag Don't sleep on Reformation's bag selection. Sam Edelman Michaela Rhinestone Mary Jane Flat These cuties are over 50% off. UGG® Tazz Maxi Curly Genuine Shearling Platform Slipper Attention: Uggs are on sale. Free People From Me to You Long Sleeve Sheer Lace T-Shirt This top is perfect for layering. Reformation Vivia Embroidered Scallop Top J.Crew This weekend, you can snag 40% off at J.Crew and save an additional 50% on sale items. J.Crew Étienne Oversized Shirt in Lightweight Oxford J.Crew Gwen Lace-Trim Slip Skirt in Textured Satin The navy shade looks so expensive. J.Crew Lower-Rise Wide-Leg Jean These are still available in almost every size. J.Crew jcrew Madelyn Blazer in Four-Season Stretch The sale is a great time to grab timeless pieces like this blazer. Style this cardigan underneath the blazer and pair it with the jeans above—voilà, a perfect outfit. GapYou won't want to miss Gap's Long Weekend Sale—the retailer is offering up to 60% off. Gap Linen-Blend Shell Tank Top I can't stop thinking about this set for spring. Gap Linen-Blend Mini Skort Oh, and don't forget the matching bottoms. Gap 100% Cotton Cable-Knit V-Neck Sweater This sweater is 100% cotton and on sale for under $50—I'd call that a steal. Gap High Rise Stride Wide-Leg Ankle Jeans I love the fit on these—they come in a handful of colors. Gap Strapless BiStretch Corset Top Meet your new favorite going-out top. Other Brands Mango Belt Handmade Coat - Women | Mango Usa Mango is offering up to 70% off selected styles, plus score an extra 15% when you spend $170 or more. Mango A-Line Dress - Women | Mango Usa Adidas Gazelle Indoor Shoes Save 30% on all full-price and sale items at Adidas until February 18 with the code SAVE. COS Single-Breasted Car Coat Selected styles at COS are up to 40% off until February 18. COS Relaxed Striped Long-Sleeved Polo Shirt Valentino Garavani Small Ohval Shoulder Bag in Nappa Calfskin Saks' Designer Sale has items up to 70% off until February 17. Staud Eton Sequined Boatneck Minidress Schutz Boris Kitten-Heel Slingback Pumps
html:
For many people, long weekends mean an extra day off to spend with family and friends, but for me, they only mean one thing: holiday sale shopping. Okay not really, but the fashion editor in me does look forward to browsing online for amazing deals. I know the best items go quickly, so I got a head start on planning for this season's Presidents' Day sales. Spoiler alert: They're really good. Specifically, those at Nordstrom, Gap, and J.Crew—with discounts on must-have items like coats, shoes, knits, blouses, denim, and more, it's almost impossible not to grab something. I have no doubt these great finds will go quickly, so don't waste another second. Peruse my edit of favorites below.

Nordstrom

Scrolling through Nordstrom's Winter Sale is like being a kid in a candy shop. You can score up to 60% off on clothes, beauty, and accessories.

Reformation

Martha Front Button Asymmetric Top

Mocha mousse is the moment.

Lioness

Cobain Stripe Cotton Blend Pants

I'd wear these on WFH days.

Veronica Beard

Penny Loafer

These loafers are so quiet-luxury coded.

Stuart Weitzman

Flareblock 60 Zip Bootie

You can't go wrong with a black bootie.

Reformation

Medium Rosetta Leather Shoulder Bag

Don't sleep on Reformation's bag selection.

Sam Edelman

Michaela Rhinestone Mary Jane Flat

These cuties are over 50% off.

UGG®

Tazz Maxi Curly Genuine Shearling Platform Slipper

Attention: Uggs are on sale.

Free People

From Me to You Long Sleeve Sheer Lace T-Shirt

This top is perfect for layering.

Reformation

Vivia Embroidered Scallop Top

J.Crew

This weekend, you can snag 40% off at J.Crew and save an additional 50% on sale items.

J.Crew

Étienne Oversized Shirt in Lightweight Oxford

J.Crew

Gwen Lace-Trim Slip Skirt in Textured Satin

The navy shade looks so expensive.

J.Crew

Lower-Rise Wide-Leg Jean

These are still available in almost every size.

J.Crew

jcrew

Madelyn Blazer in Four-Season Stretch

The sale is a great time to grab timeless pieces like this blazer.

Style this cardigan underneath the blazer and pair it with the jeans above—voilà, a perfect outfit.

Gap

You won't want to miss Gap's Long Weekend Sale—the retailer is offering up to 60% off.

Gap

Linen-Blend Shell Tank Top

I can't stop thinking about this set for spring.

Gap

Linen-Blend Mini Skort

Oh, and don't forget the matching bottoms.

Gap

100% Cotton Cable-Knit V-Neck Sweater

This sweater is 100% cotton and on sale for under $50—I'd call that a steal.

Gap

High Rise Stride Wide-Leg Ankle Jeans

I love the fit on these—they come in a handful of colors.

Gap

Strapless BiStretch Corset Top

Meet your new favorite going-out top.

Other Brands

Mango

Belt Handmade Coat - Women | Mango Usa

Mango is offering up to 70% off selected styles, plus score an extra 15% when you spend $170 or more.

Mango

A-Line Dress - Women | Mango Usa

Adidas

Gazelle Indoor Shoes

Save 30% on all full-price and sale items at Adidas until February 18 with the code SAVE.

COS

Single-Breasted Car Coat

Selected styles at COS are up to 40% off until February 18.

COS

Relaxed Striped Long-Sleeved Polo Shirt

Valentino Garavani

Saks' Designer Sale has items up to 70% off until February 17.
